mapper.insert: insert into ecs_admin (adminID, name, sex, userID, astate, acity, address, pwd, aphone, note) values (#{adminid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{astate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{acity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ecs_admin set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, astate = #{astate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, acity = #{acity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aphone = #{aphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where adminID = #{adminid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select adminID, name, sex, userID, astate, acity, address, pwd, aphone, note from ecs_admin
